resources.string: Together we can save lives and help people keep their jobs.
Sorry, this device does not support Bluetooth LE
We need your permission to use Bluetooth to monitor your distance from other devices.\nIt\'s anonymous.
To monitor more accurately your interactions we will ask you permission to use Location.\nIt\'s anonymous.
If you\'ve been close to an infected person in the past two weeks, we will notify you.\n\nThat\'it, just one notification.
Remember to leave your Bluetooth and Location on, and we\'ll do the rest.
We will use your mobile phone Bluetooth to anonymously log all the devices that get closer than 2 meters to you.
How do we maintain your anonymity?
We only store the interactions that happen between yours and other devices, and how long the interactions last for. We do not store any personal information or location history.
How do you keep me safe?
You will be alerted when you’ve been close to an infected person, up to 14 days back.
How do you know who’s sick?
Your status, and others in the network will be validated by professional medical staff selected by the government, by scanning the QR code in your app.
What happens if I receive the notification that I could be at risk?
You have been exposed to someone that has tested positive. Protect your loved ones by self-isolating for two weeks.
What can I do to help?
Just leave this app running in the background, and we\'ll do the rest. If you want to help us, share this app with your loved ones to keep them safe.
